- Assign new font styles to your contact Names.
PIMP YOURCOMMENTS, WRITE BETTERSTATUS MESSAGES AND GET MORE RETWEETS...
Unique fonts that can be used everywhere you can type a message (Email,SMS, social networking apps...)
Cool Fonts app does not install fonts in your Android Phone. You can type message in Cool fonts with the selected font and Copy. You can paste copied text in any other apps.
These special fonts are based on UniCode Based fonts. Once you send message to your friends, they can see the styled text even though they are not having Cool Fonts app in their device. Also if the recipient is not using Android device still they can see message in styled text. UNICODE Fonts are supported by all major platforms ( Android, iOS & Windows Phones).
Some of lower end Android devices are not supporting for some font styles. In such cases you see Box when you type any alphabet. This is not a bug. Your device is not supporting UNICODE Fonts.
We are listening ---- We have got lots of feedback about using these fonts in Instagram. Just type message in Cool fonts app & Copy. Then you can open Instagram App and paste it any where you want.
Be one of the first to get it and surprise your friends with a text message written in Cool Fonts ;)
